Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!
Services: oral & maxillofacial surgery.

Business Name: Leigh Kent DDS PhD-Dental Implants & P
Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry: Aaron Cook, DMD
Business Information: Our wide array of services are designed to offer treatments that improve your oral health and give you a smile that lets your true beauty shine through. You can count on us to provide you with all the information you need to make informed decisions about your dental care so there are never any surprises.  At Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry, we don’t offer one-size-fits-all solutions. We recognize you as the unique individual you are, and we will work with you to find conservative, affordable treatments that fit your dental needs, budget, and lifestyle.  We are all here because we want to show you the difference that a healthy smile can make to your life. Each member of our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional oral health care with a kind touch and concern for your well-being. We believe that you deserve our full attention, and we will take all the time necessary to answer your questions about dental care.  Obtaining quality dental care should never feel like a hassle. We offer early morning hours to accommodate your busy schedule, and visiting us is a breeze with our convenient, close-in parking. If you experience a dental emergency, we will do our best to fit you in the same day. For an after-hours emergency, please call our office number for instructions on how to get in touch with us.  Financial considerations should never get in the way of your oral health care. We are contracted with a number of dental insurance providers, but we will file all insurance claims. If you are uninsured, we’ve got you covered! We are happy to offer CareCredit and Healthy Smiles, a reduced-fee dental plan.  We would love to welcome you to our comfortable Birmingham dental office for a visit. We look forward to meeting you and your family!

Vestavia Family Dentistry & Facial Aesthetics has acquired a 5-star rating on the online platform as an accredited Fellow of the International Academy of Facial Aesthetics. Dr. G. Robin Pruitt Jr. and his entire team provide the most advance and cutting edge dental and surgical technology and procedures for their patients in a beautiful, caring comfortable and relaxed environment.

Business Name: Dr. Burton Gooch Family & Cosmetic Dentistry
Business Information: Our comprehensive dental care practice - located in the Lee Branch shopping center in Birmingham, Alabama - concentrates on family and cosmetic dentistry. Our dental team members are extremely experienced and knowledgeable about dental health and all dental procedures such as porcelain veneers, dental implant, teeth whitening, permanent crowns and bridges. We are happy to answer any questions that you may have at any time.

We make high quality dental care convenient and affordable at our Vital Smiles office located near you. Our friendly and experienced dental professionals provide a wide range of family dental services including orthodontics, cosmetic dentistry and emergency dental care. Our general dentists, specialists and hygienists are all under one roof. Which means that treatment for implants, braces, or periodontal care can take place in the same office. Here, we gladly treat patients of all ages, including young children. We also welcome walk-ins, offer evening and weekend appointments, and accept a variety of dental plans including Medicaid and ALL Kids. FREE exams and x-rays for new patients.

Business Name: Koch Aesthetic Dentistry - The Dental Spa
Business Information: Welcome to Koch Aesthetic Dentistry - The Dental Spa located at 2311 Highland Avenue, Ste 323 Birmingham, AL 35205, where we are dedicated to providing advanced cosmetic dentistry and sedation dentistry, superior patient comfort and dazzling results. Award-winning Birmingham cosmetic dentist Dr. J. Paul Koch, DMD, is passionate about creating beautiful and functional smiles with the latest and most effective procedures to repair cracked, stained, crooked, damaged, or missing teeth. Our cosmetic dentistry procedures include dental implants, porcelain veneers, teeth whitening, dental crowns, Invisalign, and much more for our patients in the Mountain Brook area. Call or visit our office today for a smile that shines!

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

Gooch Family Dental in Birmingham is led by Burton Gooch, DDS. Our dentists offers general, cosmetic and restorative treatments including sedation dentistry, dental crowns, dental implants and more! Our dentists focus on creating lasting relationships with our patients with honest communication, exceptional service, and high-quality dental care. We want to give you the most access to the best care that modern dentistry has to offer in a fast, convenient time frame. Make an appointment for the whole family today. You can reach our Birmingham office online, or by calling!

At Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry, we believe that we have achieved the perfect mix of modern, up-to-date dental treatment and good old-fashioned friendly care. You deserve the very best, and every time you call or visit our office, you will be greeted by a welcoming voice and warm smile.

Business Name: Clark Holmes Smith Oral Facial Surgery
Business Information: Oral & Maxillofacial Surgeons, Mark Clark, D.M.D., M.D., F.A.C.S.,F.I.C.D., Jon D. Holmes, D.M.D. and George W. Matthews Jr., D.M.D., Birmingham, AL, practice a full scope of oral and maxillofacial surgery with expertise ranging from corrective jaw surgery to wisdom tooth removal. Board Certified Maxillofacial Surgeon

At Central Avenue Dentistry we take great satisfaction in helping you maintain optimal oral health and aesthetics. Our practice is devoted to comprehensive and preventive patient care, general dental care, with a special expertise in cosmetic dentistry.Our patients are our top priority, and we strive to develop long-lasting, trusting relationships with all of our patients. Your referrals are welcome and appreciated. 
 
We look forward to seeing you and your smile!

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

At Spink Dentistry, we consider ourselves a partner in your health care and we strive to offer the best dentistry possible in a warm, relaxing environment. If you suffer from dental anxiety, we make every effort to discuss your concerns, educate you on dental procedures and offer sedation dentistry to ensure your comfort and confidence in your dental treatment.

Aspen Dental dentists are dedicated to making it easier to get the care you need. They believe in treating each patient like family and providing comprehensive care in a compassionate and judgment-free environment. At Aspen Dental, we've simplified everything to give you peace of mind. We make payment the easy part with transparent pricing and our commitment to everyday low prices. We offer all dental and denture services and we'll work with you on your treatment plan to find what works best for you. Our dentures are custom crafted in our on-site denture labs for speedy turnaround in as little as 24 hours and provide the most natural fit, look, and feel. We're here for you when you need us most with convenient locations and extended office hours, including evenings and select Saturdays. Scheduling an appointment is easy! You can schedule your appointment by phone Monday - Saturday, 7am - 9pm EST. Or visit us online to schedule an appointment. Emergencies and walk-ins are always welcome.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!

We believe that you deserve our full attention, and we will take all the time necessary to answer your questions about dental care.  Obtaining quality dental care should never feel like a hassle. If you experience a dental emergency, we will do our best to fit you in the same day. For an after-hours emergency, please call our office number for instructions on how to get in touch with us.  Financial considerations should never get in the way of your oral health care. We are contracted with a number of dental insurance providers, but we will file all insurance claims. Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!

Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry: Aaron Cook, DMD
Business Information: Our wide array of services are designed to offer treatments that improve your oral health and give you a smile that lets your true beauty shine through. You can count on us to provide you with all the information you need to make informed decisions about your dental care so there are never any surprises.  At Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry, we don’t offer one-size-fits-all solutions. We recognize you as the unique individual you are, and we will work with you to find conservative, affordable treatments that fit your dental needs, budget, and lifestyle.  We are all here because we want to show you the difference that a healthy smile can make to your life. Each member of our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional oral health care with a kind touch and concern for your well-being. We believe that you deserve our full attention, and we will take all the time necessary to answer your questions about dental care.  Obtaining quality dental care should never feel like a hassle. We offer early morning hours to accommodate your busy schedule, and visiting us is a breeze with our convenient, close-in parking. If you experience a dental emergency, we will do our best to fit you in the same day. For an after-hours emergency, please call our office number for instructions on how to get in touch with us.  Financial considerations should never get in the way of your oral health care. We are contracted with a number of dental insurance providers, but we will file all insurance claims. If you are uninsured, we’ve got you covered! We are happy to offer CareCredit and Healthy Smiles, a reduced-fee dental plan.  We would love to welcome you to our comfortable Birmingham dental office for a visit. We look forward to meeting you and your family!

Vestavia Family Dentistry & Facial Aesthetics has acquired a 5-star rating on the online platform as an accredited Fellow of the International Academy of Facial Aesthetics. Dr. G. Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. Business Name: Leigh Kent DDS PhD-Dental Implants & P
Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry: Aaron Cook, DMD
Business Information: Our wide array of services are designed to offer treatments that improve your oral health and give you a smile that lets your true beauty shine through. You can count on us to provide you with all the information you need to make informed decisions about your dental care so there are never any surprises.  At Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry, we don’t offer one-size-fits-all solutions. We recognize you as the unique individual you are, and we will work with you to find conservative, affordable treatments that fit your dental needs, budget, and lifestyle.  We are all here because we want to show you the difference that a healthy smile can make to your life. Each member of our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional oral health care with a kind touch and concern for your well-being. We believe that you deserve our full attention, and we will take all the time necessary to answer your questions about dental care.  Obtaining quality dental care should never feel like a hassle. We offer early morning hours to accommodate your busy schedule, and visiting us is a breeze with our convenient, close-in parking. If you experience a dental emergency, we will do our best to fit you in the same day. For an after-hours emergency, please call our office number for instructions on how to get in touch with us.  Financial considerations should never get in the way of your oral health care. We are contracted with a number of dental insurance providers, but we will file all insurance claims. If you are uninsured, we’ve got you covered! We are happy to offer CareCredit and Healthy Smiles, a reduced-fee dental plan.  We would love to welcome you to our comfortable Birmingham dental office for a visit. We look forward to meeting you and your family!

Vestavia Family Dentistry & Facial Aesthetics has acquired a 5-star rating on the online platform as an accredited Fellow of the International Academy of Facial Aesthetics. Dr. G. Robin Pruitt Jr. and his entire team provide the most advance and cutting edge dental and surgical technology and procedures for their patients in a beautiful, caring comfortable and relaxed environment.

Business Name: Dr. Burton Gooch Family & Cosmetic Dentistry
Business Information: Our comprehensive dental care practice - located in the Lee Branch shopping center in Birmingham, Alabama - concentrates on family and cosmetic dentistry. Our dental team members are extremely experienced and knowledgeable about dental health and all dental procedures such as porcelain veneers, dental implant, teeth whitening, permanent crowns and bridges. We are happy to answer any questions that you may have at any time.

We make high quality dental care convenient and affordable at our Vital Smiles office located near you. Our friendly and experienced dental professionals provide a wide range of family dental services including orthodontics, cosmetic dentistry and emergency dental care. Our general dentists, specialists and hygienists are all under one roof. Which means that treatment for implants, braces, or periodontal care can take place in the same office. Here, we gladly treat patients of all ages, including young children. We also welcome walk-ins, offer evening and weekend appointments, and accept a variety of dental plans including Medicaid and ALL Kids. FREE exams and x-rays for new patients.

Business Name: Koch Aesthetic Dentistry - The Dental Spa
Business Information: Welcome to Koch Aesthetic Dentistry - The Dental Spa located at 2311 Highland Avenue, Ste 323 Birmingham, AL 35205, where we are dedicated to providing advanced cosmetic dentistry and sedation dentistry, superior patient comfort and dazzling results. Award-winning Birmingham cosmetic dentist Dr. J. Paul Koch, DMD, is passionate about creating beautiful and functional smiles with the latest and most effective procedures to repair cracked, stained, crooked, damaged, or missing teeth. Our cosmetic dentistry procedures include dental implants, porcelain veneers, teeth whitening, dental crowns, Invisalign, and much more for our patients in the Mountain Brook area. Call or visit our office today for a smile that shines!

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

Gooch Family Dental in Birmingham is led by Burton Gooch, DDS. Our dentists offers general, cosmetic and restorative treatments including sedation dentistry, dental crowns, dental implants and more! Our dentists focus on creating lasting relationships with our patients with honest communication, exceptional service, and high-quality dental care. We want to give you the most access to the best care that modern dentistry has to offer in a fast, convenient time frame. Make an appointment for the whole family today. You can reach our Birmingham office online, or by calling!

At Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry, we believe that we have achieved the perfect mix of modern, up-to-date dental treatment and good old-fashioned friendly care. You deserve the very best, and every time you call or visit our office, you will be greeted by a welcoming voice and warm smile.

At Central Avenue Dentistry we take great satisfaction in helping you maintain optimal oral health and aesthetics. Our practice is devoted to comprehensive and preventive patient care, general dental care, with a special expertise in cosmetic dentistry.Our patients are our top priority, and we strive to develop long-lasting, trusting relationships with all of our patients. Your referrals are welcome and appreciated. 
 
We look forward to seeing you and your smile!

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

At Spink Dentistry, we consider ourselves a partner in your health care and we strive to offer the best dentistry possible in a warm, relaxing environment. If you suffer from dental anxiety, we make every effort to discuss your concerns, educate you on dental procedures and offer sedation dentistry to ensure your comfort and confidence in your dental treatment.

Aspen Dental dentists are dedicated to making it easier to get the care you need. They believe in treating each patient like family and providing comprehensive care in a compassionate and judgment-free environment. At Aspen Dental, we've simplified everything to give you peace of mind. We make payment the easy part with transparent pricing and our commitment to everyday low prices. We offer all dental and denture services and we'll work with you on your treatment plan to find what works best for you. Our dentures are custom crafted in our on-site denture labs for speedy turnaround in as little as 24 hours and provide the most natural fit, look, and feel. We're here for you when you need us most with convenient locations and extended office hours, including evenings and select Saturdays. Scheduling an appointment is easy! You can schedule your appointment by phone Monday - Saturday, 7am - 9pm EST. Or visit us online to schedule an appointment. Emergencies and walk-ins are always welcome.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!

Business Information: Our wide array of services are designed to offer treatments that improve your oral health and give you a smile that lets your true beauty shine through. You can count on us to provide you with all the information you need to make informed decisions about your dental care so there are never any surprises.  At Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry, we don’t offer one-size-fits-all solutions. We recognize you as the unique individual you are, and we will work with you to find conservative, affordable treatments that fit your dental needs, budget, and lifestyle.  We are all here because we want to show you the difference that a healthy smile can make to your life. Each member of our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional oral health care with a kind touch and concern for your well-being. We believe that you deserve our full attention, and we will take all the time necessary to answer your questions about dental care.  Obtaining quality dental care should never feel like a hassle. We offer early morning hours to accommodate your busy schedule, and visiting us is a breeze with our convenient, close-in parking. If you experience a dental emergency, we will do our best to fit you in the same day. For an after-hours emergency, please call our office number for instructions on how to get in touch with us.  Financial considerations should never get in the way of your oral health care. We are contracted with a number of dental insurance providers, but we will file all insurance claims. If you are uninsured, we’ve got you covered! We are happy to offer CareCredit and Healthy Smiles, a reduced-fee dental plan.  We would love to welcome you to our comfortable Birmingham dental office for a visit. We look forward to meeting you and your family!

Dr. Thomas and his staff would like to welcome you to their dental practice! We are conveniently located in Centerpoint, Alabama, and Springville, Alabama, to better serve our patients. Thomas, DMD has established a trusted reputation within his community for clinical excellence while providing affordable dental services. Dr. Thomas graduated from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1988, and following graduation he opened his family dentistry practice in Centerpoint, Alabama. His newest location in Springville opened in 2010, and Dr. Thomas is excited to serve the St. Clair County area.  Dr. Thomas has been practicing for over 25 years in the dentistry field and offers treatment plans to fit your personal needs and budget.  Dr. Thomas is a member of the American Dental Association and was awarded in June 2012 for his 25 years of service to the dentistry field.

Addressing your individual needs is priority number one at Moulton Dentistry. Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Whether it has just been a while since your last check-up or you want to help a loved one improve their smile, we will be glad to assist you with appointments Monday through Friday with same day emergency appointments available..  We offer Single Visit Dentistry that ranges from 3M Composite "no metal" fillings to CEREC digital CAD/CAM crowns, veneers and bridges, root canal therapy, implant restorations and oral surgery. Dr. Cole also can help manage medical issues utilizing TMJ appliances, Botox and C-PAP alternatives. He also provides cosmetic tooth straightening using Invisalign aligners and ZOOM! Whitening.  If you are apprehensive about receiving dental treatment, we offer oral sedation as well as nitrous oxide for a comfortable visit. You may also enjoy satellite television through out the entire office.  If you have questions about your teeth or would just like a "second" opinion before initiating treatment, we welcome your call. Using our wireless intra oral cameras, you can see what we see conveniently on our television monitors. We proudly offer a Limited Warranty with our dentistry.

Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!
Services: oral & maxillofacial surgery.

Business Information: Our wide array of services are designed to offer treatments that improve your oral health and give you a smile that lets your true beauty shine through. We are all here because we want to show you the difference that a healthy smile can make to your life. Each member of our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional oral health care with a kind touch and concern for your well-being. We believe that you deserve our full attention, and we will take all the time necessary to answer your questions about dental care.  Obtaining quality dental care should never feel like a hassle. We offer early morning hours to accommodate your busy schedule, and visiting us is a breeze with our convenient, close-in parking. If you experience a dental emergency, we will do our best to fit you in the same day. For an after-hours emergency, please call our office number for instructions on how to get in touch with us.  Financial considerations should never get in the way of your oral health care. We are contracted with a number of dental insurance providers, but we will file all insurance claims. If you are uninsured, we’ve got you covered! We are happy to offer CareCredit and Healthy Smiles, a reduced-fee dental plan.  We would love to welcome you to our comfortable Birmingham dental office for a visit. We look forward to meeting you and your family!

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Whether it has just been a while since your last check-up or you want to help a loved one improve their smile, we will be glad to assist you with appointments Monday through Friday with same day emergency appointments available..  We offer Single Visit Dentistry that ranges from 3M Composite "no metal" fillings to CEREC digital CAD/CAM crowns, veneers and bridges, root canal therapy, implant restorations and oral surgery. Dr. Cole also can help manage medical issues utilizing TMJ appliances, Botox and C-PAP alternatives. He also provides cosmetic tooth straightening using Invisalign aligners and ZOOM! Whitening.  If you are apprehensive about receiving dental treatment, we offer oral sedation as well as nitrous oxide for a comfortable visit. You may also enjoy satellite television through out the entire office.  If you have questions about your teeth or would just like a "second" opinion before initiating treatment, we welcome your call. Using our wireless intra oral cameras, you can see what we see conveniently on our television monitors. We proudly offer a Limited Warranty with our dentistry.

Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!
Services: oral & maxillofacial surgery.

Business Name: Leigh Kent DDS PhD-Dental Implants & P
Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry: Aaron Cook, DMD
Business Information: Our wide array of services are designed to offer treatments that improve your oral health and give you a smile that lets your true beauty shine through. You can count on us to provide you with all the information you need to make informed decisions about your dental care so there are never any surprises.  At Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry, we don’t offer one-size-fits-all solutions. We recognize you as the unique individual you are, and we will work with you to find conservative, affordable treatments that fit your dental needs, budget, and lifestyle.  We are all here because we want to show you the difference that a healthy smile can make to your life. Each member of our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional oral health care with a kind touch and concern for your well-being. We believe that you deserve our full attention, and we will take all the time necessary to answer your questions about dental care.  Obtaining quality dental care should never feel like a hassle. We offer early morning hours to accommodate your busy schedule, and visiting us is a breeze with our convenient, close-in parking. If you experience a dental emergency, we will do our best to fit you in the same day. For an after-hours emergency, please call our office number for instructions on how to get in touch with us.  Financial considerations should never get in the way of your oral health care. We are contracted with a number of dental insurance providers, but we will file all insurance claims. If you are uninsured, we’ve got you covered! We are happy to offer CareCredit and Healthy Smiles, a reduced-fee dental plan.  We would love to welcome you to our comfortable Birmingham dental office for a visit. We look forward to meeting you and your family!

Vestavia Family Dentistry & Facial Aesthetics has acquired a 5-star rating on the online platform as an accredited Fellow of the International Academy of Facial Aesthetics. Dr. G. Robin Pruitt Jr. and his entire team provide the most advance and cutting edge dental and surgical technology and procedures for their patients in a beautiful, caring comfortable and relaxed environment.

Business Name: Dr. Burton Gooch Family & Cosmetic Dentistry
Business Information: Our comprehensive dental care practice - located in the Lee Branch shopping center in Birmingham, Alabama - concentrates on family and cosmetic dentistry. We are happy to answer any questions that you may have at any time.

We make high quality dental care convenient and affordable at our Vital Smiles office located near you. Our friendly and experienced dental professionals provide a wide range of family dental services including orthodontics, cosmetic dentistry and emergency dental care. Our general dentists, specialists and hygienists are all under one roof. Which means that treatment for implants, braces, or periodontal care can take place in the same office. Business Name: Koch Aesthetic Dentistry - The Dental Spa

Award-winning Birmingham cosmetic dentist Dr. J. Paul Koch, DMD, is passionate about creating beautiful and functional smiles with the latest and most effective procedures to repair cracked, stained, crooked, damaged, or missing teeth. Call or visit our office today for a smile that shines!

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!

Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!

Financial considerations should never get in the way of your oral health care. We are contracted with a number of dental insurance providers, but we will file all insurance claims. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Whether it has just been a while since your last check-up or you want to help a loved one improve their smile, we will be glad to assist you with appointments Monday through Friday with same day emergency appointments available..  We offer Single Visit Dentistry that ranges from 3M Composite "no metal" fillings to CEREC digital CAD/CAM crowns, veneers and bridges, root canal therapy, implant restorations and oral surgery. Dr. Cole also can help manage medical issues utilizing TMJ appliances, Botox and C-PAP alternatives. He also provides cosmetic tooth straightening using Invisalign aligners and ZOOM! Whitening.  If you are apprehensive about receiving dental treatment, we offer oral sedation as well as nitrous oxide for a comfortable visit. You may also enjoy satellite television through out the entire office.  If you have questions about your teeth or would just like a "second" opinion before initiating treatment, we welcome your call. Using our wireless intra oral cameras, you can see what we see conveniently on our television monitors. We proudly offer a Limited Warranty with our dentistry.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!
Services: oral & maxillofacial surgery.

We are confident that you will feel right at home in our office as we welcome all patients as if they were family.

Business Name: Leigh Kent DDS PhD-Dental Implants & P
Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry: Aaron Cook, DMD
Business Information: Our wide array of services are designed to offer treatments that improve your oral health and give you a smile that lets your true beauty shine through. You can count on us to provide you with all the information you need to make informed decisions about your dental care so there are never any surprises.  At Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry, we don’t offer one-size-fits-all solutions. We recognize you as the unique individual you are, and we will work with you to find conservative, affordable treatments that fit your dental needs, budget, and lifestyle.  We are all here because we want to show you the difference that a healthy smile can make to your life. Each member of our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional oral health care with a kind touch and concern for your well-being. We believe that you deserve our full attention, and we will take all the time necessary to answer your questions about dental care.  Obtaining quality dental care should never feel like a hassle. We offer early morning hours to accommodate your busy schedule, and visiting us is a breeze with our convenient, close-in parking. If you experience a dental emergency, we will do our best to fit you in the same day. For an after-hours emergency, please call our office number for instructions on how to get in touch with us.  Financial considerations should never get in the way of your oral health care. We are contracted with a number of dental insurance providers, but we will file all insurance claims. If you are uninsured, we’ve got you covered! We are happy to offer CareCredit and Healthy Smiles, a reduced-fee dental plan.  We would love to welcome you to our comfortable Birmingham dental office for a visit. We look forward to meeting you and your family!

Vestavia Family Dentistry & Facial Aesthetics has acquired a 5-star rating on the online platform as an accredited Fellow of the International Academy of Facial Aesthetics. Dr. G. Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Alabama Periodontics, the office of Dr. Brett Maddux in Birmingham, AL. We are a periodontal office dedicated to improving the health, beauty, and function of your smile. Periodontists are specialists with three additional years of training in the the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease and the placement of dental implants. Periodontal (gum) disease is a preventable disease of the gums that can lead to tooth loss and decay. Recent studies have linked periodontal disease to serious health complications like stroke, heart disease, and premature birth. If you have been told you have gum disease, it is important that you seek treatment right away. Our office is conveniently located in Birmingham, AL. We are a group of of professionals dedicated to providing each of our patients with exceptional care in a comfortable, relaxing setting. Dr. Maddux is a LANAP certified clinician. The LANAP Laser Treatment is the first and only FDA cleared laser protocol for the treatment of moderate to severe periodontal disease. Call Us Today!

Thomas, DMD has established a trusted reputation within his community for clinical excellence while providing affordable dental services. Dr. Thomas graduated from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1988, and following graduation he opened his family dentistry practice in Centerpoint, Alabama. His newest location in Springville opened in 2010, and Dr. Thomas is excited to serve the St. Clair County area.  Dr. Thomas has been practicing for over 25 years in the dentistry field and offers treatment plans to fit your personal needs and budget.  Dr. Thomas is a member of the American Dental Association and was awarded in June 2012 for his 25 years of service to the dentistry field.

Addressing your individual needs is priority number one at Moulton Dentistry. Of course, his restorative, cosmetic, emergency and sedation dentistry can help you restore, enhance and manage your dental concerns in a calming office environment. He gladly accepts dental insurance from many different providers and offers an in-house membership savings plan for those lacking insurance but in need of treatment. Feel free to call his office to get started!
